Ithaca Dragon Boat Club

☰

  • Contact Us

Our season is roughly mid-April to mid-October. We practice Mondays and Wednesdays 6pm-7:30pm and Saturdays 9am-10:30am at the Cass Park Docks.

During the offseason, we have winter workouts, also Monday and Wednesday evenings. Contact us for more information!
